languages.text: "Мне показалось, ты очень резко реагировала на слова Ардженты у той разбитой линзы".

traits.locale_text: "Мне показалось, ты очень резко реагировала на слова Ардженты на Райкади Филии".

languages.text: "You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."
languages.original_text: "Мне показалось, ты очень резко реагировала на слова Ардженты у той разбитой линзы".

traits.locale_text: "You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said on Kiava Gamma."
"You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."
"You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said on Kiava Gamma."
"You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said on Rykadi Philia."
"You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."
"You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."

languages.text: «Lo que dijo Argenta junto a la lente rota pareció causarle una profunda turbación».
languages.original_text: "You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que dijo Argenta en Rykadi Philia pareció causarle una profunda turbación».

languages.text: 「壊れたレンズでのアルジェンタの発言にひどく動揺していたな」
languages.original_text: "You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."

traits.locale_text: 「壊れたレンズでのアルジェンタの発言にひどく動揺していたな」

languages.text: “当时，阿洁塔看到那些破碎的透镜的时候，你的反应好像很激烈。”
languages.original_text: "You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."

traits.locale_text: “在莱卡德菲利亚星的时候，你当时对阿洁塔的话似乎反应很激烈。”

languages.text: « Vous semblez avoir réagi très vivement aux propos d'Argenta devant la lentille brisée. »
languages.original_text: "You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."

traits.locale_text: « Vous semblez avoir réagi très vivement aux propos d'Argenta sur Rykadi Philia. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt sehr stark auf Argentas Worte bei der zerbrochenen Linse reagiert."
languages.original_text: "You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt sehr stark auf Argentas Worte auf Rykadi Philia reagiert."

languages.text: "Argenta'nın kırılan mercekle ilgili dediklerine aşırı tepki vermedin mi?"
languages.original_text: "You seemed to have a very strong reaction to what Argenta said by the broken lens."

traits.locale_text: "Argenta'nın kırılan lensle ilgili söylediği şeye sanki fazla ciddi bir tepki verdin."
